patthana24.22:6.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.22:7.1: Naaraṇaṃ nanadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.22:7.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana24.22:8.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nasauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.22:8.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana24.22:12.1: Nasaraṇo nasauttaro dhammo araṇassa sauttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ.
patthana24.22:13.1: Nasaraṇo nasauttaro dhammo araṇassa sauttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ.
patthana24.22:14.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana24.22:16.1: Nasaraṇo nasauttaro dhammo araṇassa sauttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana24.22:17.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … noavigate ekaṃ.
patthana24.22:23.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naanuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā araṇo anuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.22:24.1: Nasaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo araṇassa anuttarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana24.22:24.3: Anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye dve, purejāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, vippayutte ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ.
patthana24.22:26.1: Nasaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo araṇassa anuttarassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana24.22:27.1: Naaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo araṇassa anuttarassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana24.22:27.3: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe dve … pe … naupanissaye ekaṃ, napurejāte dve … pe … noavigate dve.
patthana24.22:29.1: Nahetupaccayā upanissaye dve, purejāte ekaṃ … pe … atthiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana24.22:31.1: Anulomadukatikapaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā tiṃsamattehi bhāṇavārehi paṭṭhānaṃ.
